story-moment.ATTACK ON THE ASGARDIANS: Cull participated in Thanos’ attack on the Asgardian ship containing the Tesseract, though Ebony Maw held him back from fighting the Hulk, letting Thanos “have his fun.”
story-moment.FIGHTING WONG: Alongside Ebony Maw, Cull Obsidian attempted to take the Time Stone from Doctor Strange in New York, but an encounter with Wong led to him losing his arm and removed from the fight.
story-moment.SIEGE ON WAKANDA: During the siege on Wakanda, Cull and his hammer caused much damage to his enemies, but a fight with Bruce Banner, who was wearing the Hulkbuster 2.0 armor, would lead to his undoing.

powers+abilities.STRENGTH: An enormously strong creature, Cull Obsidian had no hesitation taking on the likes of the Hulk and was able to match the incredible power of Iron Man’s Hulkbuster 2.0 armor in battle.
powers+abilities.WAR HAMMER: Cull carries a massive war hammer which he uses both as a bludgeoning device and throwing weapon, pulling it back to him via an attached chain.
powers+abilities.CYBERNETIC ARM: After losing his left arm in battle, Cull Obsidian has it replaced with a cybernetic arm, which includes a bladed weapon.
